prompt: Create a simple user service with proto file that has CreateUser (POST /v1/users), GetUser (GET /v1/users/{id}), and DeleteUser (DELETE /v1/users/{id}) methods. Then generate the code and write a simple server that implements the service.

assertions.text: Proto file contains CreateUser, GetUser, DeleteUser methods with correct HTTP annotations
assertions.evidence: Proto file defines all three methods with proper google.api.http annotations

assertions.text: Generated Go files include goose handler code
assertions.evidence: user_goose.pb.go was generated with route registration and handlers
Server uses AppendUserServiceHttpRoute for route registration
